channel.title: Runescape Website 2011
channel.description:
Hi there i have decided to Rip the current runescape website. And Recreate it to work with rsps. Why i have done this? im sick of seeing stupid lame website's.
So far i have Main page. All Css All jquery All images
I am planning on working on this untill it is finished. [IMG]http://i802.photobucket.com/albums/yy308/h0p2it/runescape.jpg[/img]
I also need some idea's of what to add/fix/edit.
I am planning on releasing this by 2 weeks. If anyone would like to help out on this development it would be much appreciated. Thanks for reading and enjoy.

item.title: Runescape Website 2011
item.dc:creator: @Torpedo Torpedo
item.description:
@Torpedo wrote:

teh_codex:

To be honest this is for learning purposes and when i finish the tos jagex cant enter the site lol.

Teh_Codex,

I’m sorry to inform you, but currently, Jagex holds property of their site, therefore, this holds title to everything that is portrayed on the site.

If you were to make an exact replica of the RuneScape homepage, you are therefore breaking their ToS and Copyright notice. Jagex may take all legal actions possible.

[hr]

Other than that, you’re embarking on a major project! I’m interested to see it finished

Good luck!

Read full topic
